name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic Italian pasta with rich meat sauce.
recipe: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente. Prepare a savory meat sauce with ground beef, tomatoes, and herbs.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection.
recipe: Marinate salmon fillet with lemon, garlic, and herbs. Grill the salmon until it's cooked through and has a nice char.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
recipe: Roll out pizza dough and spread a layer of tomato sauce. Top with fresh mozzarella cheese and basil leaves.
